an4.81:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.81:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, and lie.
an4.81:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.81:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven
an4.81:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, or lie.
an4.81:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
